General.Name: Vinh Hoan Corp
General.Description: Vinh Hoan Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, engages in growing, manufacturing, processing, preserving, and trading aquatic products in Vietnam. Its products include pangasius breaded and marinated fillets; and other food products, such as surimi and seasoned shrimp panga burger, as well as ready-to-eat products, including grilled pangasius, dried fish snack, and fish skin with salted eggs. The company also extracts and manufactures hydrolized colagen and gelatin for use in medicine, cosmetics, and food products, as well as engages in the fish hatcheries. In addition, it offers aquatic feed products; trades in chemicals, machines, equipment, and supplies used in producing and processing aquatic products; and produces and sells oil and fat from animals and plants. The company also exports its products. Vinh Hoan Corporation was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Cao Lanh, Vietnam.
